segments.text: The kitchen draws me in with its everyday vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight through the window brightens the garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's task seems relaxing, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, I spot the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, it's shocking how much is spilling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not reacting at all, standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are at the cookie jar, what mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting dangerously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet they're sharing, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the wet floor adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes my heart race a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
